title: Staking Pool as a Service
description: Setting up a staking pool is demanding. Even by doing everything by the book, you still need 3rd party scripts and careful management.

f6_assessments.q0: The project would surely increase the number of stake pools, but the proliferation of "stakepools as a service" could actually be extremely dangerous for the integrity of the network. If the majority of stake pools ended up with very few hands actually running them, there would be every opportunity to compromise the network. Therefore, I cannot with good conscience recommend this type of project although it exposes a weakness in the PoS approach more so than in the proposal itself.
f6_assessments.q1: The project is relatively easy to realise, so I have no doubts that the service would be made available.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget appears reasonable, although details have not been provided. The availability of the final deliverable is easy to verify.

solution: We will offer a staking pool as a service.
experience: Our devops engineers have 21+ years of experience automating various cloud infrastructure and application deployment flows.
